resources:
Having Trouble? Encountered a bug or have feedback? Report it as soon as possible! Report on GitHub Contact via Telegram https://github.com/diphons/DKM-SU/issues https://t.me/d8gdiskusi Confirm DKM SU DKM - SU Home Not installed Click to install Working Version Superusers Modules DKMSU v2 signature not found in kernel! [ !KSU_DKMSU || != size/hash ] Ask your kernel developer to integrate DKMSU! Device Kernel Kernel Manager SuSFS SuS SU Android Manager SELinux Disabled Enforcing Permissive Unknown Superuser Failed to enable module: %s Failed to disable module: %s No module installed Module Do you want to continue installing module %1$s? Sort (A - Z) Sort (Z - A) Uninstall Restore Install Install Reboot Settings Power Menu Shutdown Soft Reboot Recovery Bootloader Download EDL About Are you sure you want to uninstall module %s? %s uninstalled Failed to uninstall: %s Are you sure you want to restore module %s? %s restoreed Failed to restore: %s Version Author Modules are unavailable as OverlayFS is disabled by the kernel. System Module Magic Mount OverlayFS Use OverlayFS Toggle between using OverlayFS or Magic for DKM SU mount system Reboot Required Changes will take effect after rebooting the system. Would you like to reboot now? Restore module Restore modules from recent backup. Backup module Backup currently installed modules. Warning This feature is still in beta and under development. Please ensure you backup your modules before proceeding. Use this feature only if you understand the potential risks. Proceed with caution. Proceed Cancel Later Show Refresh Show system apps Hide system apps Send logs Safe mode Reboot to take effect Modules are unavailable due to a conflict with Magisk! üî• DKM Build https://github.com/diphons/DKM-SU DKM experimental branch. Check it out on GitHub! ‚ö†Ô∏è Experimental Development Warning! 127.0.0.1 Next is a non-official build which is always under active experimental development. It is provided as-is, with no guarantees of stability, performance, or reliability. ‚Ä¢ Use at Your Own Risk: It may experience crashes, unexpected behavior, or cause system issues. ‚Ä¢ No Warranty: The developers are not responsible for any data loss, system damage, or other consequences arising from its use. ‚Ä¢ For Testing Purposes Only: It is intended for users who understand the risks and are comfortable troubleshooting issues. View source code at %1$s App Profile Default Template Custom Profile name Mount namespace Inherited Global Individual Groups Capabilities SELinux context Umount modules Failed to update App Profile for %s The current DKM-SU version %1$d is too low for the manager to work properly. Please upgrade to version %2$d or higher! Umount modules by default The global default value for "Umount modules" in App Profile. If enabled, it will remove all module modifications to the system for apps that don't have a profile set. Hide suspecious su hooks It disables kprobe hooks made by ksu, and instead the non-kprobe inline hooks will be enabled, just the same implementation for non-gki kernel without kprobe supported. Enabling this option will allow DKM-SU to restore any modified files by the modules for this app. Domain Rules Update Downloading module: %s Start downloading: %s New version %s is available, click to upgrade. Launch Close Force stop Restart Failed to update SELinux rules for: %s Changelog App Profile Template Manage local and online template of App Profile Create template Edit template ID Invalid template id Name Description Save Delete View template Read only Template ID already exists! Import/Export Import from clipboard Export to clipboard Cannot find local template to export! Imported successfully Sync online templates Failed to save template Clipboard is empty! Fetch changelog failed: %s Check update Automatically check for updates when opening the app Failed to grant root! Action Open Enable WebView debugging Can be used to debug WebUI, please enable only when needed. Direct install (Recommended) Select a file Install to inactive slot (After OTA) Your device will be **FORCED** to boot to the current inactive slot after a reboot!
Only use this option after OTA is done.
Continue? Next %1$s partition image is recommended Select KMI Minimize sparse image Resize the sparse image where the module is located to its actual size. Note that this may cause the module to work abnormally, so please only use when necessary (Such as for backup). Uninstall Uninstall temporarily Uninstall permanently Restore stock image Temporarily uninstall DKM-SU, restore to original state after next reboot. Uninstalling DKM-SU (Root and all modules) completely and permanently. Restore the stock factory image (If a backup exists), usually used before OTA; if you need to uninstall DKM-SU, please use "Uninstall permanently". Flashing Flash success Flash failed Selected LKM: %s Save logs Logs saved Performance Mode Performance Mode is disabled Balance Battery Game Performance Game Ai Enable to use Game Ai Disable to use Profile Mode Game Ai Log Enable to show Game Ai running in kernel log Game Mode Profile Mode Touch Touch Mode Set touchscreen mode to use Double Tap to WakeUp Wake up your device by double tapping the screen. Improvement touch Enable to use improvement touch bump resample Haptic Level Screen Settings Set additional features for screen settings Sound Control Set sound gain to high or low on Mic, Ear or Headset Headphone Gain Headphone Gain - Left Headphone Gain - Right Speaker Gain>> Microphone Gain Earpiece Gain (Calls) Per-channel controls Gesture Tracking Get batter real-time response throughout the whole gesture Active Mode Fast tap response Speed up tap response at the hardware level Tolerance Aim Sensitivity Stabilisation algorith Make smaller gestures more responsive using the dedicated algorithm Expert Mode Edge Filter Grip Mode Color Calibration Set Color Calibration, AMOLED or set it yourself Reset Remove RGB Adjustments Saturation Value Contrast Hue Amoled Color Use amoled colors for a more premium appearance Refresh Rate Set refresh rate for your display A higher display refresh rate allows for smoother viewing but drains the battery faster. In some low-usage scenarios, your phone may optimize to a lower refresh rate in order to preserve battery life. Reduce green tint some devices get green tint at 90hz refresh rate like alioth or munch, enable to reduce green tint on screen when using 90hz refresh rate Power Settings Current Status Enabled Profile Charger Max Dynamic Charging Disable to use select mode Enable to use dynamic charging If the charging does not match your device, set the power profile in the menu above.

Warning.!!
Set according to the maximum charging power of your device. Skip Thermal Used to bypass maximum temperature when charging battery Force Fast Charging Force adapter detected as USB to charge as AC Night Charging Stepped charging The system adjusts the upper limit of the charging speed in stages according to the power level to help protect the battery life

It is generally recommended to keep the default setting Off Low Medium High Not Set Dynamic (evaluation) Class 0 AR & VR In-Calls Game 2 Extreme Camera PUBG Youtube Manual Settings Start Apply is started Misc Another options you can use Block Joyose Blocked joyose causes your device temperature to heat up quickly, make sure you use a device cooler when playing games.

This option only works for MIUI / HyperOS roms that have Joyose. FPS Monitor FPS Only Scene OnePlus This option will only display the fps monitor. This option displays fps, cpu, gpu, temperature and power consumption monitors. This option displays the fps, cpu, gpu monitor, and on the small display there will be a display of ram usage, battery temperature and battery capacity. Show FPS Monitor Enable to show fps monitor viewer Disable to hide fps monitor viewer Small View Enable to show small view Disable to show large display Show Battery Show and hide battery percentage Show Temperature Show or hide battery temperature Show RAM Show or hide RAM Usage Please authorize the display of floating window (pop-up window) permissions for DKM SU first! Rendering Jitter Test jitter redering - CPU - UI - RT duration on your device Spaces are not alowed in the input Custom SuSFS Settings See more custom susfs settings for your use SuSFS Features SuSFS Enabled Features SuSFS Log Hide Custom ROM Path Hide GAPPS Hide Revanced (YT/YTM) Hide CMDLINE Hide KSU Loop Force Hide LSPosed Mounts DKM Service is not started, start it to use more feature Storage UFS Health Info Your UFS storage will die soon Health
